AI Description: OpenMPI 4 is an open-source Message Passing Interface (MPI) library that enables parallel computing on a wide range of architectures. It supports programming in C, C++, and Fortran and allows users to develop scalable and efficient parallel applications.
Core Features: Support For Mpi-1, Mpi-2, & Mpi-3 Standards, Dynamic Process Management, Interoperability With Various Programming Languages, High-Performance On Clusters & Supercomputers, Scalable For Large-Scale Parallel Computing
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Message Passing Interface, High-Performance Computing, Scalable Computing
